alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 10:01PM MDT until March 25 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches except locally up to 5 inches in areas impacted by persistent lake effect snow band. Lake effect snow impacts are most likely from Layton to Parleys Canyon. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Utah Valley and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible. Icy roadways are also possible, especially along elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
